original_title: Hot Times in the Hollywood Hills
overview: Arielle refuses her boyfriend's engagement ring and arrives at the Hollywood home of her beautiful cousin Tracy. Tracy introduces her to the local modeling scene and photographer Scardino, and handsome model Lance. Lance arouses Arielle's attention, but international intrigue and espionage arise to threaten their affairs, and Arielle must balance her sex life with national security concerns.
title: Hot Times in the Hollywood Hills
